column6:
The exciting conclusion of "A Dream of Two Good Men." The Exiles have their final showdown with Victor Von Doom's Four Fantastic as the clock ticks for a broken dimension. Will Doom's Earth be saved? Does it deserve to be?,2007,10
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Simon Bowland | writer:Chris Claremont | penciller (cover):Tomm Coker | penciller:Clayton Henry | inker:Norman Lee | colorist:Wil Quintana
